text: Get Ya Mind Correct is the first collaborative studio album by American rappers Paul Wall and Chamillionaire. They were in a group called The Color Changin' Click, The album was released when they were both on the Paid In Full Label. The album was at #67 on the BillboardTop R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums chart. The album was nominated for Indie Album of the Year in The Source magazine. There's a Chopped and Screwed version by DJ Michael '5000' Watts for Swishahouse. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2002 albums Category:Chamillionaire albums
title: Get Ya Mind Correct
